1370: Ghoudekinen moved to Davids hof.B.2 after marriage.
Got married to Costan at age 21 in 1370.
Gave birth to Wendelmodis in 1370 at age 21.
1371: Gave birth to Heylewigis in 1371 at age 22.
1372: Gave birth to Soeten in 1372 at age 23.
1373: Gave birth to Adolfus in 1373 at age 24.
1376: Gave birth to Wouter in 1376 at age 27.
1377: Gave birth to Ghoudekinen in 1377 at age 28.
1380: Lost daughter Marcibilia when Marcibilia was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Marcibilia in 1380 at age 31.
1381: Gave birth to Eustacius in 1381 at age 32.
1382: Gave birth to Gosuinus in 1382 at age 33.
1383: Gave birth to Didderic in 1383 at age 34.
1384: Gave birth to Arnst in 1384 at age 35.
1387: Gave birth to Weitijn in 1387 at age 38.
